Plot: The Radetzky March charts the history of the Trotta family through three generations spanning the rise and fall of the Austro-Hungarian Empire. Through the Battle of Solferino, to the entombment of the last Hapsburg emperor, Roth's intelligent compassionate narrative illuminates the crumbling of a way of life.
Characters: Franz Joseph I of Austria, Carl Joseph Trotta, Franz Trotta, Joseph Trotta, Max Demant, Frau Slama, Jacques Kromichl, Eva Demant, Count Wojciech Chojnicki, Captain Wagner, Frau von Taussig, Dr. Skowronneck, Onufrij
